::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus turns in his command-chair, looking at the scanners. Delta still 
hadn't moved from his position.

"Delta," he says into his comm-link, "The bridge is down the corridor, to the 
right."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer walks up to Oinker.

"So, you're the new bot, eh? Follow me to your quarters," he says, walking 
off toward a spare room.
